We serve over 5,000 families annually across New York and South Florida, with a focus on underserved communities, particularly families disproportionately impacted by systemic inequities.", "notes": "The drive-thru line begins by entering the 1st entrance on the right of the building, curving around the parking lot, where the line begins in the middle lane stop sign in front of the building. Once distribution begins, the cars in line will be directed for food pick up. Please do not leave your car. Everyone will be served according to their placement in line. First come, first serve.
